title: cant post or up vote/down vote posts her in the boards.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello I have a problem where I cant comment or up vote/down vote posts here on the boards. when I try to vote it tells me I need to be level 30, and to comment level 7. I meet both of the criteria and I have for some time now. One thing I noticed (this may be the cause) is the area where is says I need to be level 7 it shows my old summoner name "Reignbow" (I highlighted it in white). When I originally made this account a long time ago the name was "Reignbow" and was only level 1 or 2 then I did not play the game for a very long time. When I decided to give this game another shot years later I came back to the same account and someone had taken my name so I changed it to "Rgn". So I'm guessing for some reason the boards still think my summoner name is "Reignbow" and I'm level 1 or 2. However, my name and icon are updated correctly on in the top right corner of this website.

I also just noticed even now as I type this it says i am posting this as "Reignbow" below. It should be "Rgn"

replies.body: It looks like your account just needed to sync up with the boards.  Is everything okay now?
Yes everything seems fine now, thank you for the response.
oh, after making this post it all seems to be fixed somehow. Maybe creating this thread somehow made my account update?
